entries.description: Fix a not connected error when starting connection to CodeCatalyst Dev Environment from link
CodeWhisperer supports Json, yaml and Tf
CodeWhisperer security scans support typescript, csharp, json, yaml, tf and hcl files.
Auth: Redesign Add Connection page to show all options at once
CodeWhisperer: Uses Generative AI and automated reasoning to rewrite lines of code flagged for security vulnerabilities during a security scan.
